settings.tab1_content:
A high-powered antioxidant serum that combines 15% pure vitamin C, 0.5% ferulic acid and vitamin E provides environmental protection while reducing oxidative damage that can lead to signs of aging and a compromised skin barrier. This serum helps improve the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, helps with loss of firmness, and brightens the skin's complexion. Can also be helpful in reducing the appearance of dark spots and hyperpigmentation.

 

100 days, 100% guaranteed. *Compare to SkinCeuticals C E Ferulic

Custom formulated in New Jersey, USA.
settings.tab2_content:
15% L-ascorbic acid | 0.5% Ferulic acid | Tocopheryl acetate 

Water, Ethoxydiglycol, Propanediol, Ascorbic Acid, Glycerin, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Ferulic Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Tocopheryl Acetate, Pentylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Malonic Acid, Vanillin.
settings.tab3_content:
Directions:
Apply to clean skin then massage onto face, neck and chest area in upwards motions. Do not rinse. Store in a cool, dark place.

For brighter, protected skin:Use in the AM after cleansing and/or toning followed by your other fave serums (like Daily Triple!). Follow with a moisturizer + SPF to protect your skin all day long! Can also be used at night depending on preference.

For double the brightening effects, pair with:- Niacinamide
- Azaleic Acid
- Kojic Acid
- Alpha Arbutin

Avoid pairing with (if you have sensitive skin):- Retinol
- AHA's
- BHA's

settings.heading: Fiercely Formulated
settings.sub_heading: Efficacy is at the forefront of every product we create. With the help of world class chemists, we formulate our products with clinically proven ingredients at the perfect levels for results you can feel and see. No irritating alcohols or fragrance, no unnecessary fillers or fluff, just powerhouse actives at our core. Our formulas are clinically developed, dermatologist recommended, and skincare lover approved.
settings.box1_description: This pure form of vitamin C is highly potent to provide age fighting benefits along with protection against environmental stress and helps to neutralize free radicals.
settings.box2_description: The antioxidant properties of this vitamin E acetate can help neutralize free radicals and aid in soothing inflammation.
settings.box3_description: This plant based antioxidant helps to neutralize free radicals which can cause aging effects on the skin. Ferulic acid pairs well with vitamins C and E to boost benefits and stability.

settings.heading: 100 DAYS, 100% GUARANTEE
settings.sub_heading: If you don't absolutely love your Brandefy Skincall products, return them within 100 days for a full refund.

settings.text: Markups in beauty are outrageous. We're working to change that by partnering with world class chemists and the best manufacturers (that make the prestige brands you know and love). We bring these fiercely formulated products directly to you - without the traditional hefty markup.

settings.question: How do I add this Vitamin C Serum into my routine
settings.answer: We recommend applying to clean skin after cleansing and/or toning as your first serum. We prefer to add Vitamin C into our AM routine, but it can absolutely be used in the PM if you prefer! It can be layered with ingredients including, but not limited to, niacinamide, hyaluronic acid, and peptides and makes a great pair with our Daily Triple serum.

settings.question: Is this Vitamin C Serum gluten-free?
settings.answer: Yes, our 15% Vitamin C Serum is gluten-free.

settings.question: Is this Vitamin C Serum right for me?
settings.answer: We formulated our 15% Vitamin C Serum to be suitable for all skin types with ingredients that everyone can benefit from. Ascorbic acid, vitamin E acetate, and ferulic acid help to fight aging, moisturize the skin, and repair the barrier. If you're not already using these ingredients, they will be a great boost to your routine especially if your skin is on the drier side!

settings.question: How could I prolong the life of my Vitamin C?
settings.answer: Ascorbic acid is an unstable ingredient that is really difficult to formulate with. The addition of antioxidants such as ferulic acid and vitamin E acetate help to stabilize the formula. You should store your serum in a cool, dark place and always make sure to limit oxygen exposure to ensure you get the longest life possible!

settings.question: Is the Vitamin C Serum non-comedogenic?
settings.answer: This is a super interesting topic! Ingredients that are comedogenic on their own aren’t necessarily pore clogging in a finished product. Conversely, a product with no pore clogging ingredients may still be comedogenic on the skin. With that being said, our 15% Vitamin C Serum does not contain ingredients with the potential of clogging pores!
